jj_title_1: Join a network of active neighbours
jj_title_2: Organize your sport activities away from social networks mess
landing_section_1_title: What we are trying to do
landing_section_1_description_1: JustJoin is a service to escape to offline.
landing_section_1_description_2: Our mission is to connect people and make them sociable back again.
landing_section_1_description_3: JustJoin is not about dating, it’s about networking and sport.
landing_section_2_subtitle_1: A stranger in a new place
landing_section_2_description_1: Want to play football in your leisure time, but do not know a team to join?
landing_section_2_description_2: You want to assemble your own team of the same enthusiastic athletes.
landing_section_2_description_3: Your company rents a sports facility but it is always a struggle to get enough people to show up?
landing_section_3_description: On JustJoin there’s always a sport context. That makes it easier to find people and events, not being distracted by clutter typical for social networks. Make sports more valuable in your ordinary life.
landing_section_4_description_1: JustJoin is designed to be free of any fees and we prefer to keep it clean of ads mess in future. For people it will remain lifetime free, however we will support donations and paid accounts for organizations.
landing_section_4_description_2: You can create event for today evening within 10 seconds. On the other hand you can manage whole s eries of events.
landing_section_4_description_3: JustJoin can export your events to google calendar so you can track them on any device. You can also be notified by email on all incoming actions.
landing_section_4_description_4: We try to support as many activities as we can so you could feel free managing all your social activities.
activities_description: Tell us about your sports activities. Do you play basketball with friends? Can you play tennis? Do you want a company on your workout? Or maybe you would like to be invited to try sea kayaking?
activity_comments: Comments about your relation to this activity
be_invited_to_events: Get invited to events near you
finish_wizard_description: We shall notify you when the service is ready so that you will be the first to explore it.
general_description: Registration requires a few more details. Please introduce yourself to proceed. This will help us adjust service just for you.
schedule_description: You can just skip this step or specify any time periods that you like.
activity_description: Tell us about sports activities you would like to manage. We will search events and users for you that match your selected items. Do you play basketball with friends? Can you play tennis? Or maybe you would like to be invited to try sea kayaking?
schedule_title: What is you average spare time that is suitable for activities you selected?
activity_title: What activities are you experienced in?
ICE_SNOW: Winter activities on ice and snow
